title: Four men shot on Erb Street
content:
BUFFALO, N.Y. (WIVB) – Buffalo Police are looking for a shooter who opened fire on four men. It happened just after 10 p.m. Sunday in the 100 block of Erb Street.
Police said the men range in age from their late teens to early 20s. They were all shot in the foot and treated at Erie County Medical Center.
Police are looking into whether this incident was a drive-by shooting.
